title: L4 ADC to duo with
body:
Im currently only lvl25 spending a lot of time mastering support champions and learning about counter picking pro team comps and who to ban in preparation for ranked, if any adc out there would like to help me out pls friend me in game (IGN: guthixianfist).

I'd prefer it if you had skype and decent mic.

replies.body: Happy to provide some guidance, although I may not be able to due because I'm primarily playing ranked atm, but I can help you out with anything you ask. Accept my friend request :D
